Text:
Yep, Tokyo Hot has the formula down to a recipe.  The only thing that changes is the girl.  I suppose Japanese porn addicts must not get bored seeing the same thing played out video after video after video for years.

As for me, the girl has to be exceptional for me to spend bandwidth on a Tokyo Hot video.  Some of the other studios show much more imagination and have a higher standard for their models.
Yep, finaly, someone speak that out...
